actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit an individual to be claimed as a dependent without regard to the gross income of the individual.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a personal exemption deduction for a dependent without regard to: (1) such dependent's gross income; or (2) whether the dependent, if a child, is under age 19 or a student.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit an individual to be claimed as a dependent without regard to the gross income of the individual.
